caption: First, there is a map with castles and trees. These castles are under construction, and the trees are growing, but they all appear to be made of toys. Then, it transitions to reality. Two people are conversing inside a tent, seemingly discussing something. They easily exit the tent and continue their conversation while walking on an outdoor road. Nearby, a man informs the other man about something, and he immediately goes to another location. There, a chubby man is trying to put on armor with the help of his attendants, but they struggle to get him into the armor, leading to the chubby man scolding them. Then, the first man enters, and they chat happily.
